atAGlance.title: At-a-Glance (summary)
atAGlance.summary1: Mythoria asks only for the minimum data needed to open an account (name, e-mail and phone) and to craft personalised stories from the prompts you supply.
atAGlance.summary2: All content is stored in EU-based Google Cloud data centres; story prompts are relayed to OpenAI's Enterprise API, which keeps them for ≤ 30 days solely to detect abuse and never uses them to train public models unless you opt-in. You may delete your account at any time and, except for legal archives (e.g. invoices), your personal data disappear from active systems within 30 days.
atAGlance.summary3: Below you can read all mandatory GDPR disclosures, children's-privacy rules (Portuguese digital age of consent 13 years), cookie details and your rights.

section2.title: 2. Scope of this Policy
section2.content: This notice applies to mythoria.pt and any mobile or desktop apps branded "Mythoria". It does not cover external links that have their own privacy terms.

section3.title: 3. What data we collect

story.examples: Text prompts, character names, images you upload

generated.examples: The stories/books our AI returns to you

usage.examples: IP address, browser type, device ID, timestamps

section3.note: We ask you not to include special-category data (health, biometrics, political views, etc.). If you enter third-party personal data, you confirm you have a lawful basis to do so (Art. 14 GDPR).

section4.title: 4. Why we process your data & legal bases

stories.data: Account data, story inputs, generated content
stories.legalBasis: Contract – to provide the service you requested

account.legalBasis: Legitimate interest in running a safe service (recital 47)

abuse.data: Story inputs briefly analysed by OpenAI

section4.note: OpenAI and Google act as processors under Art. 28 GDPR; details in § 5.

section5.title: 5. AI & Cloud disclosure

openai.title: OpenAI Enterprise API
openai.description: Story prompts and outputs transit to OpenAI's EU endpoint. They are stored max. 30 days to detect abuse and are not used to train OpenAI models by default.

google.title: Google Cloud
google.description: All databases and file storage sit in the europe multi-region. Google relies on the Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses for any transfer outside the EEA.

section5.note: No other third-party receives identifiable data unless you explicitly integrate optional services (e.g. payment, mailing list), in which case those processors will be listed here before activation.

section6.title: 6. Children's privacy
section6.content: Portugal fixed the digital age of consent at 13: if a user is younger, a parent or guardian must authorise the processing (Lei 58/2019, art. 16). Mythoria's stories may target children, but accounts must be created by someone 13+ and, where required, with parental consent.

section7.title: 7. Cookies & similar technologies
section7.note: The banner shown on first visit follows EDPB Consent Guidelines 05/2020 and the Cookie-Banner Task-force report (pre-ticked boxes are disabled, reject button is first-layer).

section8.title: 8. How long we keep your data

account.retention: While account is active + 30 days, then deleted or anonymised

section9.title: 9. Security measures
section9.content: We implement ISO 27001-aligned controls: encryption in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256), least-privilege access, MFA for staff, automated patching, and annual penetration tests. Incident response follows GDPR Art. 33 breach-notice rules.

section10.title: 10. Your rights
section10.content: You may access, correct, erase, restrict, object, or port your personal data and withdraw consent at any time. Requests sent to dpo@mythoria.pt are answered within one month (Art. 12 GDPR). If you believe your rights are infringed, you can lodge a complaint with CNPD (contacts in § 1).
section10.deleteAccount: If you want to exercise your right to erasure (GDPR Art. 17) and delete your account permanently, you can do so through our dedicated account deletion page.

section12.title: 12. Changes to this Policy
section12.content: We may update this notice to reflect legal or technical changes. If the changes are material we will e-mail account holders and show an in-app banner at least 15 days before they take effect. The version history is kept at the top of this page.

section13.title: 13. Contact
section13.content: Questions about privacy? E-mail dpo@mythoria.pt or write to the address in § 1. We're here to help!
